articles.title: Nursing cancer patients during COVID-19 - NEWS CENTER Maine
articles.description: Nurses at Northern Light Cancer Care are dealing with physical and emotional changes during the coronavirus pandemic to better protect susceptible patients.

articles.title: Breakthrough For Kenyan Scientists Who Discover Natural Microbe That Completely Stops Malaria in Mosquitoes - Good News Network
articles.description: Kenyan scientists discovered a microbe–Microsporidia MB–inside some mosquitoes that completely protects them from malaria infection which spreads to humans.
articles.content:
A team of scientists in Kenya and the UK are hailing the enormous potential of a new strategy to control malaria, after discovering that a microbe completely protects mosquitoes from infection.
